about_the_game:
HAELE 3D - Portrait Studio Pro is a 3D facial anatomy drawing reference tool designed for beginner to advanced artists. With a diverse range of editable characters, expressions, lighting setups and environments, it serves as a resource for learning how to draw human faces and heads. Whether your art style is realistic, stylized, cartoon, anime or anything in between, this is easy to use app complements tutorials and aids practicing your portrait drawing or sculpting skills from sketch to finish.

It contains more characters, presets, hair and beard styles, expressions and environment options compared to the HAELE 3D - Portrait Studio Lite.

Features:

- Quickly access predefined editable configurations to streamline your workflow.

- Choose from a variety of characters to practice drawing different faces.

- Access a wide library of expressions for quick inspiration and ideas.

- Customize your characters with different facial features, proportions skin tones and materials

- Groom Variations: Change hair, beard, mustache, and eyebrow styles.

- Control the atmosphere with adjustable lighting, including 3 spotlights (color, intensity, transformation), Environment light (HDRI map, intensity), and Ground light (color, intensity).

- Select from HDRI backgrounds, solid background colors, toggle floor visibility, and customize floor color and reflectivity.

- Fine-tune camera angles, locations, positions, and field of view for the perfect reference.

- Save and Load Scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: Tested with Open XR on Meta with Meta Quest 2, but should work as well on Index, WMR and Vive
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 20 Series / AMD Radeon RX 6000 Series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: Tested with Open on Meta with Meta Quest 2, but should work as well on Index, WMR and Vive
